sentences.text: Role of the Compensation Committee
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee sets the pay and evaluates the performance of our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer and reviews and approves the compensation of a select group of other executives, including the Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer attends Compensation Committee meetings and provides information and input about the pay levels and performance of our Named Executive Officers, other than herself.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee regularly meets in executive session, during which no member of Management is present, to discuss the recommendations and approve pay actions for our Named Executive Officers, including our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Consultant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has retained the services of CAP, an independent executive compensation advisory firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the Compensation Committees request, CAP provides it with information on current trends in compensation design and emerging compensation practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CAP also provides the Compensation Committee with an annual review and analysis of the compensation programs of our Peer Group, which it updates during the latter half of the year to determine whether the compensation targets of the Named Executive Officers remain competitive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CAP reports directly to, and serves at the sole pleasure of, the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CAP provided no other services to us other than the executive compensation consulting services that were requested by the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of its annual evaluation of its advisors, the Compensation Committee solicited information from CAP regarding any actual or perceived conflicts of interest and to evaluate its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the information received from CAP, the Compensation Committee believes that the work CAP performed in 2016 did not raise a conflict of interest and that it is independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tax and Accounting Treatment of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Favorable accounting and tax treatment of the various elements of our executive compensation programs are a significantbut not a controllingconsideration in their design.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code, compensation paid to certain of our Named Executive Officers that exceeds $1 million annually is not deductible unless it qualifies as performance-based compensation as defined in Section 162(m).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We generally try to preserve the deductibility of certain incentive compensation paid to our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, to facilitate the deductibility of 2016 annual incentive bonuses paid to certain executives who were anticipated to be subject to the limitations of Section 162(m), those incentive opportunities were granted under our 2011 Annual Performance Plan,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: which capped the maximum annual incentive actually payable to each at a percentage of our 2016 PPNR.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Similarly, certain of our performance share awards were granted subject to a funding hurdle that will be satisfied if the ratio of our PPNR to average assets (from continuing operations) during the three-year performance period is at least equal to a specified percentage of the ratio of our PPNR to average assets (from continuing operations) for the preceding three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the hurdle is not satisfied, those performance shares do not fundand none of those performance shares will vestregardless of the level of achievement of the other performance goals described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Compensation Committee has not adopted a policy that requires all compensation to be deductible because we want to preserve the ability to provide cash or equity compensation to an executive that is not deductible under Section 162(m) if we believe that it is in our shareholders best interests.

sentences.text: Deferred Savings Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KeyCorp maintains the Deferred Savings Plan (DSP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participating employees may defer up to 50% of their base salary and up to 100% of their annual incentive awards (collectively referred to as participant deferrals) to the DSP once their compensation for the applicable plan year reaches the IRS compensation limits for the year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to January 1, 2015, eligibility generally was restricted to employees based on salary grade.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective January 1, 2015, eligibility was expanded to include employees with annual compensation exceeding IRS compensation limits for the year; however, the Compensation Committee (or its delegate) has the authority to exclude or include any employee from participating in the plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We provide participants with an employer match on the first 6% of participant deferrals deferred under the DSP in excess of the IRS compensation limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective January 1, 2015, we amended the DSP so that the employer match may not exceed 6% of the lesser of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the participants annual compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The employer match is subject to a 3-year vesting requirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to 2014, the DSP permitted us to make a discretionary profit sharing contribution in any amount, if any, determined annually by KeyCorps Board of Directors or its authorized committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective beginning in 2014, the discretionary profit sharing contribution feature was eliminated from the DSP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participant deferrals are invested on a bookkeeping basis in investment funds that mirror the funds offered under the 401(k) Savings Plan as well as in an interest-bearing fund.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The interest-bearing fund is credited with a monthly interest rate equal to 120% of the applicable long-term federal rate as published by the Internal Revenue Service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distributions of vested DSP benefits are made upon the employees separation from service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with our philosophy of aligning the economic interests of our directors and shareholders, the directors compensation paid to each non-employee director of KeyCorp, consists of:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a cash retainer and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) stock-based compensation, referred to as deferred shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total amount of the cash retainer paid to each director differs depending upon whether the director serves as a member of certain committees of the Board, as chair of a committee of he Board, or as Lead Director of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Mooney, as an employee of KeyCorp, does not receive any compensation for her service as a director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reviews the amount and form of directors compensation payable to KeyCorp directors in comparison to directors compensation payable at bank holding companies in our Peer Group (identified on page 44 of this proxy statement).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee periodically requests information from CAP to assist in this annual review.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee reports the results of its annual review to the full Board and recommends to the full Board changes, if any, in directors compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For 2017, the Nominating and Corporate Governance Committee recommended and the Board approved a director pay program which increases the amount of the directors annual cash retainer and award of deferred shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferral of Cash Retainer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may elect to defer payment of all or a portion of their cash retainer to a future date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Directors Deferred Share Sub-Plan, the deferred cash retainer is converted into deferred shares that are payable in KeyCorp common shares on the specified deferral date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferred Shares
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that a significant portion of the Boards compensation should be equity compensation in order to more closely align the economic interests of directors and shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Other than Ms. Mooney, each director receives an annual award of deferred shares consisting of restricted stock units under the Directors Deferred Share Sub-Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each grant is subject to a minimum three-year deferral period, which is accelerated upon a directors separation from the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deferred shares are paid 50% in KeyCorp common shares and 50% in cash based on the value of a KeyCorp common share on the earlier of the last day of the deferral period or the date of the directors separation from the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Directors may elect to further defer the payment of any award of deferred shares beyond three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a further deferral election is made, 100% of these further deferred shares are paid in the form of KeyCorp common shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Payment is not made on any further deferred shares until the designated deferral date, which may be beyond the directors separation from the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following is a summary and description of fees billed for services provided by our independent auditor, Ernst & Young, for fiscal years 2016 and 2015.

sentences.text: Pre-Approval Policies and Procedures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has adopted a Policy Statement on Independent Auditing Firms Services and Related Fees, which governs the Audit Committees pre-approval process for services provided by the independent audit firm and fees paid to such firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Those services may include audit services, audit-related services, tax services, and other services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any audit, audit-related, tax, or other services not incorporated in the scope of services pre-approved at the time of the approval of the annual audit engagement and that are proposed subsequent to that approval require the pre-approval of the Audit Committee, which may be delegated to the Chair of the Audit Committee, whose action on the request shall be reported at the next meeting of the full Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit, audit-related, tax, and other services incorporated in the scope of services pre-approved at the time of the approval of the annual audit engagement, and which are recurring in nature, do not require recurring pre-approvals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent audit firm is required to regularly report to the Audit Committee regarding the extent of audit, audit-related, tax, and other services provided by the independent audit firm and the related fees for such services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During 2016, all services were pre-approved by the Audit Committee in accordance with this policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the KeyCorp Board of Directors is composed of four non-employee directors and operates under a written charter adopted by the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee annually selects KeyCorps independent auditors, subject to shareholder ratification.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention, and oversight of the independent external audit firm retained to audit KeyCorps financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent audit firm is responsible for performing an independent audit of KeyCorps consolidated financial statements in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards and to issue a report thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for KeyCorps internal controls and financial reporting process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the Audit Committee considers the results of an evaluation of the qualifications, experience, candor, independence, objectivity, and professional skepticism of the independent external auditor in determining whether to retain the firm for the next fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As part of this evaluation, the Audit Committee reviews and considers the results of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Boards annual inspection of the independent external auditor.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The evaluation is led by KeyCorps Chief Risk Review Officer, who reports directly to the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee oversees the audit fees negotiations associated with KeyCorps retention of the independent auditor and has the sole authority to approve the audit fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, audit partners are subject to rotation requirements to limit the number of consecutive years an individual partner may provide service to KeyCorp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conjunction with this five-year mandated rotation of the audit firms lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its chairperson are directly involved in the selection of the independent auditors new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the five-year mandated rotation, a new lead engagement partner was designated in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young has been retained as KeyCorps independent external auditor continuously since the 1994 merger of KeyCorp and Society Corporation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of KeyCorp and Society Corporation had retained Ernst & Young prior to the 1994 merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The members of the Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of Ernst & Young to serve as KeyCorps independent external auditor is in the best interests of KeyCorp and its investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At each regularly scheduled meeting, the Audit Committee holds executive sessions and private meetings with individual members of management, internal audit, and the independent external auditor as the Audit Committee deems necessary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In fulfilling its oversight responsibility, the Audit Committee relies on the accuracy of financial and other information, opinions, reports, and statements provided to the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the Audit Committees oversight does not provide an independent basis to determine that management has maintained appropriate accounting and financial reporting principles or appropriate internal controls and procedures designed to assure compliance with accounting standards and applicable laws and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nor does the Audit Committees oversight assure that the audit of KeyCorps financial statements has been carried out in accordance with generally accepted auditing standards or that the audited financial statements are presented in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has reviewed and discussed the audited financial statements of KeyCorp for the year ended December 31, 2016 (Audited Financial Statements) with KeyCorps management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Audit Committee has discussed with Ernst & Young the matters required by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Boards Auditing Standard No. 1301.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has received the written disclosures and the letter from Ernst & Young required by applicable requirements of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board regarding Ernst & Youngs communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence, and the Audit Committee has discussed with Ernst & Young its independence from KeyCorp.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the foregoing review and discussions and relying thereon, the Audit Committee recommended to KeyCorps Board of Directors the inclusion of the Audited Financial Statements in KeyCorps Annual Report on Form 10-K for the year ended December 31, 2016, that was filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL TWO: Ratification of Independent Auditor
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee of the Board of Directors of KeyCorp has appointed Ernst & Young LLP (Ernst & Young) as KeyCorps independent auditor to examine the financial statements of KeyCorp and its subsidiaries for the 2017 fiscal year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends ratification of the Audit Committees appointment of Ernst & Young.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A representative of Ernst & Young will be present at the meeting with an opportunity to make a statement if such representative desires to do so and to respond to appropriate questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although shareholder approval of this appointment is not required by law or binding on the Audit Committee, the Audit Committee believes that shareholders should be given the opportunity to express their views.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the shareholders do not ratify the appointment of Ernst & Young as KeyCorps independent auditors, the Audit Committee will consider this vote in determining whether or not to continue the engagement of Ernst & Young.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this proposal will require the affirmative vote of a majority of the KeyCorp common shares represented in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends that our shareholders vote FOR the ratification of this appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL THREE: Advisory Approval of KeyCorps Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KeyCorps Board of Directors is providing shareholders with the opportunity to cast an advisory vote on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers at this Annual Meeting as required by the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 and Section 14A of the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, shareholders were asked to recommend how often they should be given the opportunity to cast this advisory vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shareholders overwhelmingly voted for an annual advisory vote on executive compensation and the Board approved this choice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders are also being asked to vote again on the frequency of the advisory vote on executive compensation, which is described in Proposal Four.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The vote on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers will not be binding on or overrule any decisions by KeyCorps Board of Directors, will not create or imply any additional fiduciary duty on the part of the Board, and will not restrict or limit the ability of KeyCorps shareholders to make proposals for inclusion in proxy materials related to executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, as described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section beginning on page 28 of this proxy statement, the Compensation Committee has taken into account the results of previous votes on this issue in considering executive compensation arrangements and will take into account the outcome of this years vote when considering such arrangements in the future.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This advisory proposal was approved by approximately 95% of the KeyCorp common shares represented at the 2016 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis section beginning on page 28 of this proxy statement, the Compensation Committee believes that the compensation of our Named Executive Officers for 2016 is reasonable and appropriate in light of the 2016 performance of the company, is consistent with our pay-for-performance compensation philosophy, and helps to ensure the alignment of managements interests with our shareholders interests to support long-term value creation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has determined that the best way to allow shareholders to vote on KeyCorps executive compensation is through the following resolution:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the shareholders approve on an advisory basis KeyCorps Named Executive Officer compensation, as described in the Compensation Discussion and Analysis and the tabular disclosure regarding Named Executive Officer compensation (together with the accompanying narrative disclosure) in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this proposal will require the affirmative vote of a majority of the KeyCorp common shares represented in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends that our shareholders vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL FOUR: Advisory Approval of the Frequency of the Shareholder Vote on KeyCorps Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act of 2010 enables KeyCorps shareholders to indicate how frequently KeyCorp should seek an advisory vote on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This advisory vote, which is also required by Section 14A of the Exchange Act, must be solicited from our shareholders at least once every six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the last vote held at the 2011 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, shareholders overwhelmingly voted for an annual advisory vote on executive compensation, and the Board of Directors approved this choice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By voting on the proposal, shareholders may indicate whether they would prefer that we conduct future advisory votes on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers annually, every two years, or every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shareholders also may, if they wish, abstain from casting a vote on this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors highly values regular and frequent input from our shareholders on important issues such as the compensation of our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors believes that an annual vote supports KeyCorps efforts to engage in an ongoing dialogue with our shareholders on our executive compensation and corporate governance practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual advisory vote on our executive compensation enables shareholders to provide timely, direct input on our executive compensation philosophy, policies, and practices, which are disclosed each year in the proxy statement for our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is advisory and not binding on KeyCorp, the Board of Directors, or the Compensation Committee in any way.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors and the Compensation Committee will consider the outcome of the vote, however, when considering the frequency of future advisory votes on the compensation of our Named Executive Officers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The next shareholder vote on the frequency of future votes on Named Executive Officer compensation will occur at our 2023 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The frequency for the advisory vote on executive compensation (that is, annually, every two years, or every three years) that receives the vote of the greatest number of the KeyCorp common shares represented in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting will be the frequency recommended by the shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors unanimously recommends that our shareholders vote in favor of an ANNUAL advisory vote on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PROPOSAL FIVE: Shareholder Proposal Seeking an Independent Board Chairman
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following proposal was submitted for inclusion in this proxy statement by Mr. Gerald R. Armstrong, 621 Seventeenth Street, No. 2000; Denver, Colorado, 80293-2001; telephone number: 303-355-1199.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Armstrong owns 20,080 KeyCorp common shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, the text of Mr. Armstrongs resolution and supporting statement appear below, printed verbatim from his submission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors recommends a vote AGAINST this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLUTION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: That the shareholders of KEYCORP request its Board of Directors to adopt a policy, and amend the by-laws as necessary, to require the Chairman of the Board of Directors to be an independent member of the Board of Directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This policy should not be implemented to violate any contractual obligation and should specify: (A) how to select a new independent chairman if the current chairman ceases to be independent during the time between annual meetings of shareholders; and, (b) that compliance is excused if no independent director is available and will serve as Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STATEMENT
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KEYCORP and WELLS FARGO & COMPANY opposed this proposal of the proponent many times in past annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although it received 54% of shares voted in its favor in the 2012 annual meeting of KEYCORP, the KEYCORP board increased the duties of its Lead Director--a person heading Eaton Corporation as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer and is governed by the tax codes of Ireland.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This does not seem beneficial to shareholders as the earnings remain reduced reflected by dividends of only 34 per share annually compared to $1.46 in 2007.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Tangible book value in 2007 was $16.47 per share compared to $11.22 at year end 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation for KEYCORPs Chairman/President has increased as she joined the Board of AT&T and received $291,702 as 2015 compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proponent believes an independent chairman would not allow this time away while KEYCORP has been unable to restore its earnings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposals proponent, a longterm shareholder of KEYCORP, caused declassification of its director terms from three years to one year and its elimination of super-majority voting requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the fall of 2016 after Wells Fargo & Company admitted its several problems, it abandoned the dual role of one person serving as its Chairman of the Board while being Chief Executive Officer and appointed an independent Chairman and independent Vice-Chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Obviously, its Board finally realized the seriousness of the issues and the impact of its paying $210,000,000 in fines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: More recently, it increased high-end estimates or reasonably possible potential litigation losses of $1,700,000,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DuPonts failures were placed upon its Board Chair and Chief Executive Officer who was ousted by its board in the same manner that Target Corporations board ousted its Chairman/Chief Executive Officer a year earlier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Studies have confirmed that under-performing companies lack an independent chairman and companies, worldwide, are routinely separating the positions of chairman and CEO (CEO Succession 2000-2009: A Decade of Convergence and Compression, Booz & Co., Summer, 2010).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Norges Bank Investment Management has stated in support of a similar proposal:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The roles of Chairman of the Board and CEO are fundamentally different and should not be held by the same person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There should be a clear division of responsibilities between these positions to insure a balance of power and authority on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you agree, please vote FOR this proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors Recommendation and Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board of Directors has carefully reviewed the proposal and recommends that the shareholders vote AGAINST it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that independent Board leadership is critical and that the Board should have the flexibility to consider all relevant factors and select the most appropriate leadership structure for the Companys circumstances at any given time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The current Board leadership structure, together with the Boards other practices, already provides effective independent oversight of management, and Board accountability and responsiveness to shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Board is committed to robust independent Board leadership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has an independent Lead Director with a meaningful role, 15 independent directors, including two new independent directors who joined the Board in 2016 in connection with KeyCorps acquisition of First Niagara, and a strong, independent committee structure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KeyCorps independent directors have elected Alexander M. Cutler to provide independent Board leadership as the Boards independent Lead Director for 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among his specific responsibilities, the independent Lead Director:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: presides at all meetings of the Board at which the Chairman is not present, including regular executive sessions of the independent and non-management directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serves as liaison between the Chairman and the independent and non-management directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approves information and meeting agendas sent to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: approves meeting schedules to assure there is sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: has the authority to call meetings of the independent and non-management directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: if requested by major shareholders, is available for consultation and direct communication;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advises on the retention of independent consultants to the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assists the Board and management in assuring compliance with applicable securities laws and fiduciary duties to shareholders;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: oversees initiatives to implement improvements to KeyCorps governance policies and the Corporate Governance Guidelines;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: serves as a focal point for independent Committee Chairs and provides guidance, coordination, and advice for the committees; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: together with the Chair of the Compensation Committee, facilitates the evaluation of the performance of KeyCorps Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Lead Director seeks input from independent and non-management directors with respect to items to be ncluded on the agenda for each Board meeting and provides feedback from the independent and non-management directors while engaging in the agenda-building process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: He is also in frequent contact with the Chairman with respect to major issues and strategic opportunities before KeyCorp, and any significant actions contemplated by KeyCorp are discussed with the Lead Director at an early stage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Lead Director interviews all candidates for election to the Board and oversees changes to the composition of Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent and non-management directors also assess the effectiveness of the Lead Director annually, in connection with the annual election of a person to fill this role, and provide candid feedback on the performance of the Lead Directors specified responsibilities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The formal evaluation process is conducted by the Board in executive session with the Lead Director excused from participation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Table of Contents
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also taken other steps to provide for independent, effective oversight of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Currently, 15 of the Boards 17 members are independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board and its committees each meet in executive session on a regular basis without the presence of management, and all Board members have complete access to management and outside advisors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each standing committee of the Board is chaired by an independent director, and each committee (other than the Executive Committee) consists solely of independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our independent directors have extensive corporate governance and leadership experience, and many have significant public company experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have added five new independent directors since 2014.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our structure enables the Board to exercise vigorous oversight of key issues relating to management development, succession and compensation, compliance and integrity, corporate governance, cybersecurity, and company strategy and risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to risk, the Board assures that Keys risks are managed in a manner that is effective and balanced and adds value for Keys shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board understands Keys risk philosophy, approves Keys risk appetite, inquires about risk practices, reviews the portfolio of risks, compares the actual risks to the risk appetite, and is apprised of significant risks, both current and emerging, and determines whether management is responding appropriately.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to risk and other areas that it oversees, the Board challenges management and promotes accountability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2011, KeyCorp has been well served by Beth Mooneys combined role as Chairman and Chief Executive Officer.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Mooneys combined leadership role has allowed her to set the overall tone and direction for KeyCorp, maintain consistency in the internal and external communication of our strategic and business priorities, and have primary responsibility for managing KeyCorps operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under Ms. Mooneys leadership, KeyCorp completed its acquisition of First Niagara in August 2016 and is working to realize the benefits of this significant transaction in order to maximize long- term value for our shareholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our many conversations between our directors and our shareholders regarding their views on Board leadership and independent oversight have confirmed our view that a strong, effective Lead Director, like Mr. Cutler, an independent Board, and independent key committees provide the independent leadership necessary to balance the combined Chairman and Chief Executive Officer role and, with the formal and informal mechanisms we have in place, result in the Board effectiveness and efficiency that our shareholders expect.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board annually (or more often if a new Chief Executive Officer is selected) evaluates KeyCorps leadership structure to assess whether it remains appropriate for the Company, taking into account a variety of factors including KeyCorps size, the nature of its business, the regulatory framework in which it operates, and the leadership structure of its peers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that a primary consideration for KeyCorp is that, as a large financial institution subject to significant regulation, KeyCorp must communicate swiftly and consistently with our stakeholders, including our regulators.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that swift and consistent communication is significantly furthered if KeyCorps leadership, through our Chairman and Chief Executive Officer, speaks as a single voice on behalf of both the Board and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our ongoing dialogue with our shareholders reinforces our belief that the Board should maintain the flexibility to separate or combine the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer roles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we believe that this shareholder proposal is not in the best interests of KeyCorp and its shareholders, and for these reasons, the Board recommends that shareholders vote AGAINST this shareholder proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Approval of this shareholder proposal will require the affirmative vote of a majority of the KeyCorp common shares represented in person or by proxy at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: General Information about the Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Matters to Be Presented
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KeyCorps Board of Directors is not aware of any other matter to be presented at the Annual Meeting except those described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any other matter is properly brought before the Annual Meeting, the individuals you have authorized to vote your shares will vote on your behalf using their best judgment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How Votes Will Be Counted
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each KeyCorp common share is entitled to one vote on each matter to be considered at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To transact business at the Annual Meeting, a majority of KeyCorps outstanding common shares must be present  person or by proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is known as a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you return a valid proxy, your shares will be counted for determining if a quorum is present at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote FOR or AGAINST, or choose to ABSTAIN from voting for, each nominee for the Board of Directors and for each of the other proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, choosing to ABSTAIN from a vote is counted as a vote AGAINST a particular proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, a vote to ABSTAIN from the election of any director (as in Proposal One of this proxy statement) will not be counted as a FOR or AGAINST vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you choose to ABSTAIN on any or every proposal, your shares will still be counted toward the quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares through a broker, your brokers ability to vote your shares for you is governed by the rules of the New York Stock Exchange.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without your specific instruction, a broker or other nominee may only vote your shares on routine proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your broker will submit a proxy card on your behalf but leave your shares unvoted on non-routine proposalsthis is known as a broker non-vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Without your specific instruction, your broker will not vote your shares on Proposals One (Election of Directors), Three (Advisory Approval of KeyCorps Executive Compensation), Four (Advisory Approval of the Frequency of the Shareholder Vote on KeyCorps Executive Compensation), and Five (Shareholder Proposal Seeking an Independent Board Chairman), which the New York Stock Exchange considers non-routine proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-votes will not be counted FOR or AGAINST these proposals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Two is a routine matter on which your broker will vote without your instruction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, broker non-votes are not expected to occur with respect to Proposal Two.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes will still be counted toward the quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure your shares are voted at the meeting, you are urged to provide your proxy instructions promptly by telephone, online, or by mailing your signed proxy card in the enclosed envelope.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KeyCorp common shares represented by properly executed proxy cards, online instructions, or telephone instructions will be voted as you direct.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not vote at all on an otherwise properly-executed proxy card or your properly submitted online instruction gives no voting direction whatsoever, the proxies will vote your shares FOR the election of the nominees named herein as directors (Proposal One), FOR the ratification of the appointment of Ernst & Young as our independent auditors for the fiscal year ending December 31, 2017 (Proposal Two), FOR advisory approval of KeyCorps executive compensation (Proposal Three), for an ANNUAL advisory vote on executive compensation (Proposal Four), and AGAINST the shareholders proposal seeking an independent Board Chairman (Proposal Five).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Revoking a Proxy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you have submitted your proxy and would like to revoke it, you may do so any time before your shares are voted at the Annual Meeting by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) filing a notice with the Secretary of KeyCorp revoking your proxy,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) submitting a new, subsequently dated proxy (whether by proxy card, online, or telephone), or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) by attending the Annual Meeting and electing to vote your shares in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your presence at the Annual Meeting alone will not revoke your proxy.
